title: New: Arkon Fly – Back Seat
body:
Following up on their infectious debut single, London duo **Arkon Fly** return with _Back Seat_, another glisteningly perfect slice of soulful inspired dance music.

A funky hybrid between the likes of Disclosure and recent break through success Jungle, mixed with a sexier vibe, more akin with someone like Justin Timberlake, and if that’s not a compliment, then I don’t know what is. Check out Back Seat below, and keep up with Arkon Fly via [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ArkonFly).
